title: Time Signs   (1991  -  Time Team Pilot Series  -  Complete)
description:
RIP - Mick Aston - 1 July 1946-24 June 2013.

A predecessor of Time Team with Mick Aston & Phil Harding.

Mick Aston turns archaeological detective to reveal the hidden stories of ancient landscapes.


Episode 1
======
Mick turns up evidence revealing that Wolf Valley was used for farming continuously since neolithic times.


Episode 2
======
Mick gets to the bottom of a mystery concerning a field with a single building which holds clues to a missing village where over 30 people lived in the 19th century.


Episode 3
======
Mick explores the mysteries of fragments of pottery found in Wolf Valley, and searches for evidence of the existence of a medieval mill.


Episode 4
======
In Wolf Valley Mick reveals the 4,000-year-old flint tools used by the areaÃ‚Â¿s earliest settlers. Can these ancient tools show us anything about the way we treat the landscape today?



Enjoy and Seed!!
